global.conten: Body temperature is the temperature of the body of a human. It is measured to obtain a quick evaluation of personâ€™s health. Body temperature is usually measured by thermometer and it is placed in the mouth, the rectum, or the auditory canal. It represents a balance between the heat produced by the body and the heat it loses.
global.conten2: Heat produced, and heat loses vary with circumstances but the body regulates them. An abnormal rise in body temperature is called FEVER.
